comment: Very poor Rear camera quality, photos app Suddenly Hanging full black screen shown, mobile back side heating by online video streaming, Internet connection poor, very slow downloading, etc...,
Features & detailsCombo of 1 Earphone + 1 Aux Cable + 1Card reader + 1 OTG Cable + 1 Finger ring Stand + 1 2 in 1 earphone jack + 1 Noosy sim adapter. But these items are not given in the box
Combo of 1 Earphone + 1 Aux Cable + 1Card reader + 1 OTG Cable + 1 Finger ring Stand + 1 2 in 1 earphone jack + 1 Noosy sim adapterThis items not received. Please send me this items...

Only 4-5 hours life of battery without any game, only Facebook, whatsaps and normal call. Is this 4000mah battery? I have called Amazon for replacement but he had told to wait 1-2 days and make records of battery consumption. I am  waiting for that lets further responce from Amazon.

Accessories not delivered as per the specifications in the Product DescriptionCombo of 1 Earphone + 1 Aux Cable + 1Card reader + 1 OTG Cable + 1 Finger ring Stand + 1 2 in 1 earphone jack + 1 Noosy sim adapter; etc.., Pl check the product desccription /& revert

I brought it today, phone is very good at that kind of price, but there is problem,battery backup is not good. It's draining to fast.And there is one blunder that In the box SIM ejector tool is missing. This is not expected from Xiaomi.
Battery and camera ok in this price

It's been 7 months since I have bought this mobile. I have visited service center twice and got software reset because I cannot hear voice properly and battery gets discharged very soon . Not only that but also it's getting heat very fast. Very bad product from redmi.
